text: This version of the game had great graphics for the PSP while maintaining a smooth 60 fps, as well as the great music and car handling you would expect from this series. It's too bad the game itself was bare bones with its lack of campaign and progression, I'm still not sure why they did that. They probably thought they could get away with it since it's a handheld entry, but it really ended up hurting the game's reception.
author: SupraDarky
